critical_gaps.title: Missing API Documentation
critical_gaps.description: No generated API reference documentation (Sphinx, MkDocs, etc.)
critical_gaps.impact: Developers cannot easily discover and use package APIs

critical_gaps.title: Incomplete Function/Method Docstrings
critical_gaps.impact: Code maintainability reduced, IDE autocomplete support limited
critical_gaps.recommendation: Add comprehensive docstrings following Google style

critical_gaps.title: Missing Parameter Type Hints
critical_gaps.impact: Reduced IDE support, harder to maintain
critical_gaps.recommendation: Add type hints to all public APIs, validate with mypy

important_gaps.title: Limited Usage Examples
important_gaps.description: Only basic examples exist, no intermediate or advanced tutorials
important_gaps.impact: Steeper learning curve for new developers
missing_examples: CLI framework usage for new tools
important_gaps.recommendation: Create comprehensive examples directory with basic, intermediate, and advanced tutorials

important_gaps.title: Outdated Documentation References
important_gaps.description: Path references in documentation point to old project structure
important_gaps.impact: Confusion for users, broken documentation links
issues: Path references use 'Music Tools/README.md' (space in path)
References to 'Tag Country Origin Editor' (old name)
important_gaps.recommendation: Update all path references to current monorepo structure

important_gaps.title: No Architecture Diagrams
important_gaps.description: Missing visual diagrams for system architecture and flows
important_gaps.recommendation: Add diagrams using Mermaid (GitHub markdown support)

minor_gaps.title: Missing Inline Comments for Complex Logic
minor_gaps.description: Some complex algorithms lack explanatory comments
minor_gaps.recommendation: Add explanatory comments for complex logic sections

minor_gaps.title: No Changelog for API Changes
minor_gaps.description: CHANGELOG.md exists but lacks API version tracking and deprecation notices
minor_gaps.recommendation: Add API changelog section with breaking changes, deprecations, and new features
